name: Bullet on The Run
description:
Uh oh! There's a wild bullet on the loose! You're goal is to catch up to that bullet and don't lose sight of it! Let's see just how long you can keep up with it!

Controls:

W - Move up

A - Move left

S - Move down

D - Move right

You can also move diagonally as well!

All of the programming was done by me!

Unity Assets used:

Pixel Font: Thaleah - Tiny Worlds

Too Cube Forest - NEMO MK2

FREE Casual Game SFX Pack - DUSTYROOM

Music: “Staff Roll”, from PlayOnLoop.com

Music: “Follow Me”, from PlayOnLoop.com
